casebody.data:
SATEC, INC. and Satec, LLC, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
The HANOVER INSURANCE GROUP, INC., Citizens Insurance Company of America, Grinspec Insurance Agency, Inc. d/b/a Centric Insurance Agency and Lee Nestel, Defendants-Respondents,
and
The Hanover Insurance Group, Inc., Citizens Insurance Company of America, Defendants/Third-Party Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
Patrick Spina, Third-Party Defendant. 079599
C-76 Sept. Term 2017 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 22, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005103-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
